name: typescript_macro_test_book
description: A repo for testing typescript macro tools and some useful usages as casting at scope!

scripts.ttsc:ttm:build: cd ttypescriptTransformer/typescript-transform-macros && npx ttsc -p tsconfig.json && cd ../.. && npm run tsc:ttsc:ttm:castingAtScope:build

author: Mohamed Lamine Allal
